docs.summary: This is summary for 'onCategoryCreated' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when a category is created.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onCategoryDeleted' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when a category is deleted.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onCategoryUpdated' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when a category is updated.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onTagCreated' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when a tag is created.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onTagDeleted' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when a tag is deleted.

members.name: cursor
members.doc: Cursor returned in last query response.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to return. If not set, defaults to 50.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: totalFailures
members.doc: For how many items the requested action was not successful

members.name: totalSuccesses
members.doc: For how many items the requested action was successful

members.name: undetailedFailures
members.doc: total number of failures without details because detailed-failure-threshold exceeded

members.name: item
members.doc: Optional created category.

members.name: itemMetadata
members.doc: Bulk actions metadata for category.

members.name: categories
members.doc: Categories to create.

members.name: fieldsToInclude
members.doc:
List of category fields to be included in the response.
One of:
INTERNAL_ID,
UNKNOWN,
URL

members.name: returnFullEntity
members.doc: Whether to return the full created category entities in the response.

members.name: bulkActionMetadata
members.doc: Bulk action metadata.

members.name: results
members.doc: Categories created by bulk action.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Category ID.

members.name: coverMedia
members.doc: Category cover image.

members.name: description
members.doc: Category description.

members.name: label
members.doc: Category label. Displayed in the categories menu.

members.name: language
members.doc: Category language.

members.name: postCount
members.doc: Number of posts in the category.

members.name: rank
members.doc: Category position in sequence. `-1` if no rank is defined.

members.name: slug
members.doc: Category slug. For example, 'category-slug'.

members.name: title
members.doc: Category title.

members.name: translationId
members.doc: ID of the category's translations. All translations of a single category will share the same `translationId`.

members.name: url
members.doc: Category page URL.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Whether cover media is custom, i.e. not resolved as first media item appearing in content.

members.name: displayed
members.doc: Whether cover media is displayed.

members.name: image
members.doc: Image details.

members.name: video
members.doc: Video details.

members.name: category
members.doc: Category info.

members.name: fieldsToInclude
members.doc:
List of category fields to be included in the response.
One of:
INTERNAL_ID,
UNKNOWN,
URL

members.doc: Category info.

members.doc: Category ID.

members.name: categoryId

members.name: fieldsToInclude

Array of category fields to be included in the response. By default, any `fieldsToInclude` not passed are not returned.
One of:

URL

members.name: category
members.doc: Category info.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Item id. Should always be provided, unless it's impossible (e.g when failing to create an item)

members.name: error
members.doc: In case of failure, details about the error

members.name: originalIndex
members.doc: The index of the item within the request array to allow the caller to correlate the request and response items

members.name: success
members.doc: Whether the action requested was successful for this item. When this value is false, error should be populated

members.name: fieldsToInclude
members.doc:
List of category fields to be included in the response.
One of:
INTERNAL_ID,
UNKNOWN,
URL

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Date the tag was created.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Tag ID.

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date the tag was updated.

members.name: label
members.doc: Tag name. Unique per blog.

members.name: language
members.doc: Tag language.

members.name: postCount
members.doc: Number of posts with this tag, including unpublished draft posts.

members.name: publishedPostCount
members.doc: Number of published posts with this tag.

members.name: slug
members.doc: Tag slug. For example, 'tag-slug'.

members.name: translationId
members.doc: ID of the tag translations. All translations of a single tag will share the same `translationId`.

members.name: url
members.doc: Tag page URL.

members.name: includeUrl
members.doc: Includes tag URL whenn TRUE. Defaults to FALSE.
